q1: Do you like Liverpool's chances in the upcoming Premier League season?
a1: They are in it to win it
q2: how many cups have they won
a2: Eighteen, but their last win was during the 1989-1990 season. Maybe this is their year!
q3: I think they had lots of chances to win
a3: A: But they have not been able to see it through and win the Premier League yet.
q4: How is the liverpool goalkeeper called?
a4: Alisson Becker is the new goalkeeper.
q5: Alisson Becker is one of the best goalkeepers.
a5: I think if he is a great goalkeeper
